root.name: Alexey's Dwice
root.description: A quest mode features 60 levels of gameplay, and arcade mode provides endless challenge. A selling point of the game was that it was developed by Alexey Pajitnov, developer of the beloved Tetris.System Requirements PC with 733 MHz equivalent or higher processor 128 MB of RAM 30 MB available hard disk space Microsoft DirectX® 7.0 or later Microsoft DirectX® 7.0 compatible 1MB PCI video card capable of at least 640 x 480 Hi Color (16 bit) display Microsoft Mouse or compatible pointing device Microsoft DirectX® 7.0 compatible sound card (optional)
